item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Hello world,

I am excited to announce that I have decided to create a technical personal blog! As a Cloud and DevOps engineer, I have a wealth of knowledge and experience to share with others in the field.

Here are a few reasons why I have decided to embark on this journey:

item.title: Urban Walk 2022
item.description: My first experience running the 5km Urban Walk 2022 marathon at Villa Lobos Park in São Paulo was unforgettable. As I arrived at the park, I was greeted by a sea of people all gearing up for the race. There was excitement and energy.

item.title: Using Hugo page bundles
item.description: Page bundles are an optional way to organize page resources within Hugo. You can opt-in to using page bundles in Hugo Clarity with `usePageBundles` in your site configuration --- or in a page's front matter.
